name: Pyramid Shooter
description:
Pyramid Shooter takes you to a mysterious and futuristic place, where each level needs to be explored.

Shoot the pyramids to allow you to move further and further into the levels, and to learn more about this unknown world.

The feeling of flying and the beautiful soundtrack doing their job to create an unique atmosphere.

Features:
* Fly over a beautiful & mysterious world
* Click to destroy pyramids, to keep flying
* Avoid obstacles by clicking on them
* Awesome music and sounds for a unique atmosphere
* Stunning graphics with 10 levels

Enjoy flying and shooting!
